channel.title: Architecture on JDHeyburn
channel.description: Recent content in Architecture on JDHeyburn

item.title: Applying Cartography
item.description: Applying Cartography With my academic background focused in infrastructure, I love seeing diagrams of topologies - they’re a pretty damn useful way of understanding architecture of an application flow amongst other things. Let’s take a look at how my portfolio site is architected out. As I mentioned in my first blog post - I’ve got several ideas on how I can improve on the architecture of this site. But what good is evaluating where you’ve come from if you don’t document what you currently have?
